summary: Gives you a nord clone as a follower
descriptionHtml:
Dear Dragonbon,
Thank you for participating in our cloning experiment. we could not have found your address so we send your clone to the sleeping giants inn in riverwood. we made our best to give him as much thuums as we can but our magic could not make only the strongest shout against dragons and the first shout you have learned. hope you participate again.
CEO of Zuma experiment
Montizuma

P.S. he might not be wearing all that we give him so please remove the dagger/sword from his inventory and give it back to him to see him with his full gear
author: Montizuma59
